citation.article-title: Proposal of Goodfellowiella gen. nov. to replace the illegitimate genus name Goodfellowia Labeda and Kroppenstedt 2006.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Goodfellowiella coeruleoviolacea (Preobrazhenskaya and Terekhova 1987) Labeda, Kroppenstedt, Euzéby and Tindall comb. nov.

Goodfellowiella coeruleoviolacea (co.e.ru.le.o.vi.o.la′ce.a. L. adj. coeruleus dark-coloured, dark blue; L. adj. violaceus violet-coloured, violet; N.L. fem. adj. coeruleoviolacea dark violet-coloured.).

Basonym Actinomadura coeruleoviolacea Preobrazhenskaya and Terekhova 1987; other legitimate homotypic synonym Saccharothrix coeruleoviolacea (Preobrazhenskaya and Terekhova 1987) Kroppenstedt et al. 1991; illegitimate homotypic synonym Goodfellowia coeruleoviolacea (Preobrazhenskaya and Terekhova 1987) Labeda and Kroppenstedt 2006.
The description of the species is as given for Goodfellowia coeruleoviolacea by Labeda & Kroppenstedt (2006).
The 16S rRNA gene sequence of the type strain has been deposited under GenBank/EMBL/DDBJ accession number DQ093349.
The type strain is DSM 43935T (=INA 3564T =JCM 9110T =NBRC 14988T =NRRL B-24058T =VKM Ac-1083T).
